name: //8dcff4
description:
In a land of corporate drones, one creative boy must venture out to seek refuge from the expectations of society. This challenging platformer will have you battling businessmen and leaping through portals that transport you to atmospheric worlds.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Created by Vincent Gamino

Art by James Candito

Music by Kevin Macleod and Tom Woxom

Special Thank to Devin Degeyter
